entry.title: APPLE MARTINI POUT POLISH LIP TREATMENT BALM
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 699.00

Introducing the Apple Martini Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm ‚Äì your newest obsession and the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the power of advanced skincare ‚Äî all packed into one sleek tube.

Scented like a refreshing apple martini, this variant adds a playful twist to your routine. The balm starts off as a vibrant green but transforms into a unique pink tint upon contact with your lips, thanks to its pH-reactive formula. The result? A flattering, custom pink hue that stays put all day long ‚Äî no touch-ups needed.

Formulated in Italy, it features highly targeted lip peptides that help reduce fine lines and wrinkles over time, while collagen boosts fullness and lip rejuvenation. Enriched with brightening ingredients, it‚Äôs also ideal for restoring natural lip color and treating darkened lips.

Our¬†moisture-lock technology creates a protective barrier that keeps lips deeply hydrated for up to 8 hours, while the metal-tip applicator delivers a cooling experience with every swipe. Lightweight, non-sticky, and pocket-sized, it‚Äôs perfect for that juicy, high-shine glazed lip look ‚Äî anytime, anywhere.

What makes this lip balm so good?

  • pH-Activated Color Change: Goes on green, turns into your perfect pink tint that lasts all day
  • Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe
  • Triple Action Formula: Hydrates like a mask, shines like a glaze, nourishes like a treatment balm
  • Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, reduce fine lines, brighten dark lips, and adds plumping effect
  • Non - Sticky High Shine: Leaves a juicy, radiant finish without any stickiness
  • Comfortable, Lightweight Formula: Cushions lips in smooth, bouncy moisture that wears comfortable all day

  • Dessert-Inspired Scent: Smells just like a crisp, zesty apple martini for a truely indulgent experience

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free Net Weight: 8 gm

entry.title: Pout Polish Duo: Day to Night Lip Balms
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 999.00

Introducing the Pout Polish AM:PM Duo ‚Äî your complete lip ritual, designed for effortless beauty and deep care from morning to night.

‚ú® AM Tinted Balm: Start your day with our tinted Pout Polish balm ‚Äì a skincare-meets-makeup multitasker. It hydrates like a lip mask, adds shine like a gloss, and tints like a dream, giving you the perfect ‚Äúskincare as makeup‚Äù finish. Think glazed lips with real benefits.

üåô PM Clear Balm: End your day with our clear, untinted balm ‚Äì a powerful overnight lip treatment that heals, soothes, and repairs while you sleep. Wake up to softer, plumper, and more rejuvenated lips every morning.

Both balms are powered by science-backed skincare actives like peptides and collagen, and infused with dessert-inspired scents that make every application a moment of joy.

What makes it so goood:

  • AM:PM Lip Routine: Tinted balm for daytime glow, untinted balm for overnight repair

  • Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe

  • Triple Action Formula: Hydration of a lip mask, shine of a lip glaze, nourishment of a lip treatment balm

  • Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, smooth fine lines, and plump lips over time

  • Non-Sticky High Shine: Delivers a radiant, glazed finish without any stickiness

  • Comfortable, Lightweight Formula: Wraps lips in non-greasy, bouncy moisture

  • Moisture Lock Technology: Provides up to 8 hours of hydration and comfort

  • Dessert-Inspired Scents: Each balm features indulgent dessert-like fragrances for a sensory treat

100% Vegan & Cruelty-free. Dermatologically Tested

Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Makeup Combo
Price: 1299.00

Get the best of both worlds: gloss and care. The Glossified Lip Plumper brings mirror-like shine, intense hydration, and plumping effects without sting, thanks to its unique melting fondue formula. Gentle plumping agents give you fuller lips instantly and improve lip texture over time.

Complement it with the Pout Polish Lip Treatment Balm ‚Äì an all-in-one solution for hydration, anti-aging, and radiance. Peptides and collagen work to rejuvenate and brighten lips while delivering a juicy glaze finish. Together, they‚Äôre a hydration-packed power duo.

entry.title: Pout Polish Lip Treatment + Happy Hour Mini Lippies Combo
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 899.00

A combo containing our Pout Polish Lip Treatment and Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks in the shade of your choice.¬†

Pout Polish Lip Treatment:¬†

Pout Polish is your ultimate lip multitasker, combining the hydration of a mask, the shine of a glaze, and the nourishment of a treatment balm. Formulated in Italy with science-backed ingredients like peptides and collagen, it visibly reduces fine lines, plumps the lips, and locks in moisture for up to 8 hours.¬†

Each shade, inspired by dessert-like scents, delivers a delightful experience, while the innovative cooling metal-tip applicator ensures smooth, refreshing application every time. The lightweight, non-sticky formula cocoons your lips in comfort, leaving them looking radiant and feeling deeply hydrated.

¬†

Happy Hour Mini Lippies:¬†

Our Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks are your ultimate travel-friendly lip companions. With 8 flake-proof, budge-proof shades, this soft, hydrating matte formula is comfortable for all-day and all-night wear. Designed for single-swipe payoff, these lippies glide effortlessly over your lips, delivering rich, long-lasting colour that stays put without bleeding.¬†¬†

Encased in luxe, travel-sized packaging, they‚Äôre perfect for touch-ups on the go and small enough to fit even in the tiniest clutches. Whether it‚Äôs a brunch date or a cocktail party, the Happy Hour Mini Lipsticks are here to elevate your lip game effortlessly!¬†

entry.title: POUT POLISH LIP TREATMENT BALM BUNDLE
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 999.00

Introducing Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm ‚Äì the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative lip treatment balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the¬†power of advanced skincare, all packed in one.

Each shade, inspired by your favourite desserts, delivers a unique, delightful scent that leaves you wanting for more! It is formulated in Italy, with highly targeted lip Peptides that remove fine lines and wrinkles over time, while the Collagen makes the lips appear fuller and rejuvenated. It also¬†comes with moisture lock technology that forms a protective layer over the lips, keeping them hydrated for up to 8 hours.

What‚Äôs more? Our Pout Polish Lip Treatment balm also features a cooling metal-tip applicator that makes the application all the more fun. It glides smoothly, providing a refreshing sensation with every swipe. It‚Äôs lightweight and non-sticky, pocket sized - perfect for wearing all day for that glazed lip look.

With Pout Polish, enjoy luscious, hydrated lips that feel as good as they look ‚Äì a daily treat that‚Äôs all care, zero guilt!

    What makes it so goood
    1. Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe
    2. Triple Action Formula: Combines the hydration of a lip mask, shine of a lip glaze, and nourishment of lip treatment balm
    3. Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, soothe fine lines and add plumping effect
    4. Non-Sticky High Shine: Gives a glazed look without any stickiness, leaving your lips with a radiant, high-shine finish
    5. Comfortable, lightweight Formula: It cocoons your lips in a non-greasy, bouncy moisture that wears comfortably all day
    6. Moisture lock Technology: Provides up to 8 hours of comfort, and hydration
    7. Dessert-Inspired Scents: Each balm is crafted with dessert-like scents for a truly indulgent experience

    100% Vegan & Cruelty-free. Dermatologically Tested¬†

entry.title: Pout Polish Lip Treatment Balm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Typsy Beauty
Type: Lip Balm
Price: 699.00

Introducing Pout Polish Peptide Lip Treatment Balm ‚Äì the ultimate fusion of skincare and makeup. This innovative lip balm combines the hydration of a lip mask, the shine of a lip glaze, and the power of advanced skincare, all packed in one.

It is formulated in Italy with highly targeted lip peptides that remove fine lines and wrinkles over time, while the collagen makes the lips appear fuller and rejuvenated. It‚Äôs also enriched with brightening ingredients, making it an ideal lip brightening balm for dark lips. The moisture-lock technology forms a protective layer over the lips, keeping them hydrated for up to 8 hours.

What‚Äôs more? Our Pout Polish Treatment Lip Balm also features a cooling metal-tip applicator that makes the application all the more fun. It‚Äôs lightweight, non-sticky, and pocket-sized, perfect for all-day wear for that glazed lip look.

Whether you‚Äôre looking for the best lip balm for women or a versatile lip balm for men, Pout Polish has you covered.

What makes this lip balm so good?

  • Metal Tip Applicator: Gives a refreshing, cooling experience with every swipe.
  • Triple Action Formula: Combines the hydration of a lip mask, shine of a lip glaze, and nourishment of a lip treatment balm.
  • Science-Backed Ingredients: Peptides and collagen hydrate, soothe fine lines, brighten dark lips, and add a plumping effect.
  • Non-Sticky High Shine: Gives a glazed look without any stickiness, leaving your lips with a radiant, high-shine finish.
  • Comfortable, Lightweight Formula: It cocoons your lips in a non-greasy, bouncy moisture that wears comfortably all day.
  • Dessert-Inspired Scents: Each balm is crafted with dessert-like scents for a truly indulgent experience.

100% Vegan & Cruelty-Free. Dermatologically Tested.
